trans-unit.source: Troubleshoot: Create and connect to a Machine Learning workspace | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Troubleshoot: Create and connect to a Machine Learning workspace | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Solutions for common issues in creating and connecting to an Azure Machine Learning workspace
trans-unit.target: Solutions for common issues in creating and connecting to an Azure Machine Learning workspace

trans-unit.source: This guide provides solutions for some frequently encountered challenges when you are setting up Azure Machine Learning workspaces.
trans-unit.target: This guide provides solutions for some frequently encountered challenges when you are setting up Azure Machine Learning workspaces.

trans-unit.source: When you create a new Machine Learning workspace, the ID you enter in the WORKSPACE OWNER field must be a valid Microsoft account (formerly Windows Live ID), for example, john-contoso@live.com or john-contoso@hotmail.com.
trans-unit.target: When you create a new Machine Learning workspace, the ID you enter in the WORKSPACE OWNER field must be a valid Microsoft account (formerly Windows Live ID), for example, john-contoso@live.com or john-contoso@hotmail.com.

trans-unit.source: It cannot be a non-Microsoft account, such as your corporate email account.
trans-unit.target: It cannot be a non-Microsoft account, such as your corporate email account.

trans-unit.source: To create a free Microsoft account, go to <linkText>www.live.com</linkText><title></title>.
trans-unit.target: To create a free Microsoft account, go to <linkText>www.live.com</linkText><title></title>.

trans-unit.source: Note that the account you used to sign in to the Azure portal to create the workspace does not automatically have permission to open that workspace, unless you specify that account as the owner.
trans-unit.target: Note that the account you used to sign in to the Azure portal to create the workspace does not automatically have permission to open that workspace, unless you specify that account as the owner.

trans-unit.source: To open a workspace in Machine Learning Studio, you must be signed in to the Microsoft Account that was defined as the owner of the workspace, or you need to receive an invitation from the owner to join the workspace.
trans-unit.target: To open a workspace in Machine Learning Studio, you must be signed in to the Microsoft Account that was defined as the owner of the workspace, or you need to receive an invitation from the owner to join the workspace.

trans-unit.source: From the Azure portal you can, however, manage the workspace, which includes the ability to change the owner and configure access.
trans-unit.target: From the Azure portal you can, however, manage the workspace, which includes the ability to change the owner and configure access.

trans-unit.source: For more information on managing a workspace, see [Manage an Azure Machine Learning workspace].
trans-unit.target: For more information on managing a workspace, see [Manage an Azure Machine Learning workspace].

trans-unit.source: Machine Learning is currently available in the South Central U.S. region.
trans-unit.target: Machine Learning is currently available in the South Central U.S. region.

trans-unit.source: If your subscription does not include South Central U.S., you may see the error message, “You have no subscriptions in the allowed regions.
trans-unit.target: If your subscription does not include South Central U.S., you may see the error message, “You have no subscriptions in the allowed regions.

trans-unit.source: Allowed regions: South Central US.”
trans-unit.target: Allowed regions: South Central US.”

trans-unit.source: To resolve this, as shown in the following screenshot, select Contact Microsoft Support from your Azure management portal, and choose Billing as the SUPPORT TYPE to request that this region be added to your subscription.
trans-unit.target: To resolve this, as shown in the following screenshot, select Contact Microsoft Support from your Azure management portal, and choose Billing as the SUPPORT TYPE to request that this region be added to your subscription.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Contact Microsoft support</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Contact Microsoft support</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The Machine Learning service needs a storage account to store data.
trans-unit.target: The Machine Learning service needs a storage account to store data.

trans-unit.source: You can use an existing storage account in the South Central U.S. region, or you can create a new storage account when you create the new Machine Learning workspace (if you have quota to create a new storage account).
trans-unit.target: You can use an existing storage account in the South Central U.S. region, or you can create a new storage account when you create the new Machine Learning workspace (if you have quota to create a new storage account).

trans-unit.source: To see if you can create a new storage account, in the management portal, go to Settings and then click Usage.
trans-unit.target: To see if you can create a new storage account, in the management portal, go to Settings and then click Usage.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Create workspace</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Create workspace</linkText>

trans-unit.source: After the new Machine Learning workspace is created, you can sign in to Machine Learning Studio by using the Microsoft account you specified as the owner of the workspace.
trans-unit.target: After the new Machine Learning workspace is created, you can sign in to Machine Learning Studio by using the Microsoft account you specified as the owner of the workspace.

trans-unit.source: If you encounter the error message, “Workspace Not Found” (similar to the following screenshot), please use the following steps to delete your browser cookies.
trans-unit.target: If you encounter the error message, “Workspace Not Found” (similar to the following screenshot), please use the following steps to delete your browser cookies.

trans-unit.source: <linkText>Workspace not found</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <linkText>Workspace not found</linkText>

trans-unit.source: To delete browser cookies
trans-unit.target: To delete browser cookies

trans-unit.source: After the cookies are deleted, restart the browser and then go to the <linkText>Microsoft Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title> page.
trans-unit.target: After the cookies are deleted, restart the browser and then go to the <linkText>Microsoft Azure Machine Learning</linkText><title></title> page.

trans-unit.source: When you are prompted for a user name and password, enter the same Microsoft account you specified as the owner of the workspace.
trans-unit.target: When you are prompted for a user name and password, enter the same Microsoft account you specified as the owner of the workspace.

trans-unit.source: Our goal is to make the Machine Learning experience as seamless as possible.
trans-unit.target: Our goal is to make the Machine Learning experience as seamless as possible.

trans-unit.source: Please post any comments and issues at the <linkText>Azure Machine Learning forum</linkText><title></title> to help us serve you better.
trans-unit.target: Please post any comments and issues at the <linkText>Azure Machine Learning forum</linkText><title></title> to help us serve you better.
